name: Hell's Janitor (Doblekaos)
description:
Hell's Janitor is a gore, frenetic, top-down shooter inspired on titles such as Tormentor X Punisher orHotline Miami. Your main objective is to survive an endless horde of demons that is attacking the city while you clean up all the mess. That's your job after all!

The title is under development. The gameplay and art are done but the sound effects and music aren't ready yet. I decided to upload it here on it's current state so I can test it. And get some feedback before it launches to steam  in a few weeks.

I have a thread on twitter where i've been posting stuff during the developing process, it's in spanish, but you can go and have a look if you want to.
